short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Amazon images by clicking buttons next to elements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save designs, pages, and ads from Amazon with one click.

AmzDesignKit.com is the 1 way to save designs from directly on Amazon. Whether thatâ€™s in search, on product detail pages, or within a storefront.

Organise them into bookmarked folders and then share them with your team or agency.

We built AmzDesignKit for Google Chrome to help you save image and video examples with one click.

Key Features
- Save hero image examples from search
- Save sponsored brand video ad examples from search
- Save secondary image examples from product detail page main image carousels
- Save brand story examples from product detail pages
- Save A+ premium examples, and A+ basic examples from product details pages
- Save Amazon storefront examples
- Save Amazon storefront sub page examples
- Save Amazon post page examples
- Organise inspiration into folders with bookmarks
- Filter by content type
- Filter by category
- Discover from a library of 30,000+ curated examples
- Smart search examples
